```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    //Declare
    employeeSalary := make(map[string]int)

    //Adding a key value
    fmt.Println("Before update")
    employeeSalary["Tom"] = 2000
    fmt.Println(employeeSalary)

    fmt.Println("After update")
    employeeSalary["Tom"] = 3000
    fmt.Println(employeeSalary)
}
```

```
Before update
map[Tom:2000]
After update
map[Tom:3000]
```
